body_html:
Is the MKL option on ./configure working on windows too (using bazel)?
I know it is working well on linux, but I am trying to compile tensorflow-cpu with MKL on windows and the contrib/cmake does not support it.
body_text:
Is the MKL option on ./configure working on windows too (using bazel)?
I know it is working well on linux, but I am trying to compile tensorflow-cpu with MKL on windows and the contrib/cmake does not support it.
body:
Is the **MKL** option on ./configure working on windows too (using bazel)?
I know it is working well on linux, but I am trying to compile tensorflow-cpu with **MKL** on windows and the contrib/cmake does not support it.
